data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ranarilalatiana, Tolotra, Bergsten, Johannes (2019): Discovery of a specialist Copelatinae fauna on Madagascar: highly ephemeral tropical forest floor depressions as an overlooked habitat for diving beetles (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae). ZooKeys 871: 89-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.36337, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.36337
